entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump @SteveDaines Don Jr’s statement about CORONAVIRUS is sicker that his daddy. No wonder his ex-wife exited as fast as she did. He has nothing positive to say about anything. What is his qualification? ZERO! Significant work experience other than at trump org? ZERO! Credibility status? ZILCH!
